ResourceHeader.ResourceName: PSP FIELDS Fluxgate Magnetometer (MAG) Magnetic Field Vectors, (VS) Venus Solar Orbital Coordinates, Level 2 (L2), 7 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Initial SPASE XML resource description submission, metadata generated by SAB

ResourceHeader.Description: PSP FIELDS Fluxgate Magnetometer data. Time resolution varies with instrument mode, ranging from 2.3-292.9 samples/sec, corresponding to 2-256 samples per 0.874 seconds (0.874 = 2^25 / 38.4 MHz, see reference [2]). The Magnetometer has 4 ranges - +/-1024, +/-4096, +/-16,384, +/-65,536 nT, selected by the ranging algorithm, based on the ambient magnetic field. Precision is +/- 15 bits, based on the 16-bit ADC. References: 1. Fox, N.J., Velli, M.C., Bale, S.D. et al. Space Sci Rev (2016) 204: 7. https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-015-0211-6 2. Bale, S.D., Goetz, K., Harvey, P.R. et al. Space Sci Rev (2016) 204: 49. https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-016-0244-5
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator S. D. Bale for use of the Data.
PSP/FIELDS Rules of the Road available at http://fields.ssl.berkeley.edu/rules/

PublicationInfo.Authors: Bale, Stuart D; Koval, Andriy; TBC; Pulupa, Marc; Quinn, Timothy; Schroeder, Peter

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, TT2000, Full Cadence
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags in Terrestrial Time 2000, TT2000, for Full Cadence Magnetic Field Vector Waveform Data
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector, VSO, Cartesian, Full Cadence
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_mag_VSO
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Vector, B, Venus Solar Orbital, VSO, Cartesian Coordinates, Full Cadence Waveform Data

Parameter.Name: Parker Solar Probe, Mission Elapsed Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_mag_VSO
Parameter.Description: Parker Solar Probe, PSP, Mission Elapsed Time, MET

Parameter.Name: Magnetometer Instrument, Range
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_mag_VSO

Parameter.Name: Magnetometer Instrument, Sensor Mode
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_mag_VSO
Parameter.Caveats: Magnetometer Mode indicates which sensor is the source of the data. 0 = Outboard or 1 = Inboard magnetometer

Parameter.Name: Magnetometer Instrument, Rate in Samples per Cycle
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_mag_VSO
Parameter.Description: Magnetometer Instrument, Measurement Rate, measured in Samples per Cycle

Parameter.Name: Magnetometer Instrument, Packet Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_mag_VSO
Parameter.Caveats: Magnetometer Packet Index (0 is start of packet)

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, TT2000, FIELDS Data Quality Flags
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags in Terrestrial Time 2000, TT2000, for FIELDS Instrument Suite Data Quality Flags
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: FIELDS Data Quality Flags
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch_quality_flags
Parameter.Description: FIELDS Instrument Suite Data Quality Flags
Parameter.Caveats: FIELDS quality flags. This is a bitwise variable, meaning that multiple flags can be set for a single time, by adding flag values. Current flagged values are: 1: FIELDS antenna bias sweep, 2: PSP thruster firing, 4: SCM Calibration, 8: PSP rotations for MAG calibration (MAG rolls), 16: FIELDS MAG calibration sequence, 32: SWEAP SPC in electron mode, 64: PSP Solar limb sensor (SLS) test. 128: PSP spacecraft is off umbra pointing. 256: High frequency noise affecting RFS and TDS receivers. 512: Antennas driven towards the FIELDS power supply rails. A value of zero corresponds to no set flags. Not all flags are relevant to all FIELDS data products, refer to notes in the CDF metadata and on the FIELDS SOC website for information on how the various flags impact FIELDS data. For more information on the quality flags describing high frequency noise and antennas driven to the rails, see release notes for PSP/FIELDS releases 8 and 9. Additional flagged items may be added in the future.
